comment.author: 32357722@N06
comment._content: When I saw this photo in the late 1960s, this was captioned as a NY & Oswego Midland train, location unknown.

comment.author: 41354729@N03
comment._content: I think this was a "Midland" train, but it is most likely a reference to the Colorado Midland railroad & not the NYO&M judging from the background and geology apparent in the picture.
